feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 8:08PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...HEAVY RAIN TUESDAY AFTERNOON AND WEDNESDAY... A quick moving but moist atmospheric river will move across the area starting Tuesday and persist into Wednesday evening. Streams and rivers will rise rapidly but at this time are expected to remain within their banks. Rain amounts will range from 1.5 to 3 inches with locally higher amounts possible. The heaviest precipitation

entry.title: Severe Weather Statement issued August 15 at 10:34AM CDT until August 15 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...THE TORNADO WARNING FOR NORTHWESTERN DUVAL COUNTY IS CANCELLED... The storm which prompted the warning has weakened below severe limits, and no longer appears capable of producing a tornado. Therefore, the warning has been cancelled. However, tropical funnel clouds are still possible with the storm.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Duval
